messages.title: This General Election is our last chance to stop Brexit.
messages.content: It will decide the future of our country for generations to come.

messages.title: The Liberal Democrats are the strongest remain party.
messages.content: We are standing on an unequivocal and united platform. A Liberal Democrat majority government will stop Brexit by revoking Article 50. Our country and local community deserves better than Boris Johnson's No Deal Brexit and Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat majority government will stop Brexit by revoking Article 50.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats won the election here 6 months ago and the Conservatives came fifth. It's between us and Labour now. Vote Liberal Democrats to Stop a Labour Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: This General Election is our last chance to stop Brexit. A Liberal Democrat majority government will stop Brexit by revoking Article 50. Our country and local community deserves better than Boris Johnson's No Deal Brexit and Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Brexit. Like 71% of us in Ealing Central and Acton, I voted to remain in the EU and I was devastated by the result. Please support us again and help Stop Brexit.
issues.environment: issues that matter, like the climate emergency
issues.government: A Liberal Democrat majority government will stop Brexit by revoking Article 50.

leaflet.personalStatement: Like 71% of us in Ealing Central and Acton, I voted to remain in the EU and I was devastated by the result. Please support us again and help Stop Brexit.

examples: In the European elections in May 2019 the Liberal Democrats came first in every single part of this constituency with approximately 36% of the vote. The Labour Party came second with approximately 20% and the Conservatives came fifth with only 8%.
This General Election is our last chance to stop Brexit.
The Liberal Democrats are the strongest remain party.
This General Election is our last chance to stop Brexit.
We are standing on an unequivocal and united platform. A Liberal Democrat majority government will stop Brexit by revoking Article 50.
The Liberal Democrats won the election here 6 months ago and the Conservatives came fifth. It's between us and Labour now. Vote Liberal Democrats to Stop a Labour Brexit.

personalStories.story: Like 71% of us in Ealing Central and Acton, I voted to remain in the EU and I was devastated by the result.

examples: It's between us and Labour now.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: I am excited to bring our positive, pro-European, liberal vision to Ealing Central and Acton as your prospective Liberal Democrat MP.
